properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A spacious family home located in a sought-after area, featuring four bedrooms, a large garden, and a modern kitchen. The property offers plenty of potential for further expansion and is within walking distance of local schools.

A modern one-bedroom apartment with open plan living space, high ceilings, and a fully fitted kitchen. The apartment is located in a convenient location, offering easy access to transport links and amenities.
This well-presented three-bedroom flat comes with a spacious living area, a fully fitted kitchen, and a balcony. The property benefits from good transport links and is close to local shops and parks.
This charming three-bedroom house offers a large living area, modern kitchen, and a well-maintained garden. It is located in a quiet residential area with excellent transport links.
This contemporary two-bedroom flat boasts a spacious living area, a modern kitchen, and an en-suite bathroom. It is located in a vibrant neighborhood with a range of amenities nearby.

A beautifully presented five-bedroom family home with a large garden, double garage, and modern amenities. The property is situated in a prestigious area, close to excellent schools and transport links.

A cozy one-bedroom apartment in a popular residential area. The apartment is well-presented and benefits from a fully fitted kitchen, spacious living room, and close proximity to local shops and transport links.

This modern four-bedroom house comes with a large open-plan kitchen, spacious living room, and a beautiful garden. It is located in a quiet and family-friendly neighborhood with excellent schools nearby.
